div.l: They cowde nat · though they dide al theyr myght
They capul cacche · he Ran away so fast
Til in a diche · they caught hym at the last
Wery and wete · as beste is in the Rayne
Comyth cely Iohn · and with hym com Alayn
Alas quod Iohn the day that I was born
Now ar we dryven · til hethyng and til scorn
Oure corn is stole · men wil vs fooles calle
Both the wardeyn · and oure felawes alle
And namly the Miller · welaway
Thus playneth Iohn as he goth bi the way
Toward the Mille · and bayard in his hond
The Miller sittyng bi the fuyre he fond
For it was nyght · and further myght they nought
But for the love of god they hym besought
Of herburgh and of ease · for theyr peny
The Miller saide agayn · if ther be eny
Suche as it is · ye shul have yowre part
Myn hous is straite · but ye han lierned art
Ye can bi argumentis · make a place
Sixe myle brode · of twenty foote of space
Late see now · if this place may suffice
Or make it Round with speche as is yow̉re guyse
Now Symond saide this Iohn bi seynt Cuthberd
Ay artow myrrie · and that is faire aunswerd
I have herd say · men shal of two thynges
Take suche as he fyndith · or suche as bryngges
But specialy · I pray the host deere
Gete vs som mete and drynk · and make vs chiere
